name: Cubol
description:
20 years ago......
a man named Cubol painted a painting so perfect, people started to think he had a curse....

one day a theif disguised as an ordinary man and asked the man if he could come fishing with him
Cubol accepted...
when they were in the middle of the lake on the boat
the disguised theif PUSHED Cubol off the boat leaving him to drown......

20 years lator present day
A new Heaven Guardian was elected in Heaven
After a few days he stumbled across Cubol, Crying in Heaven

"Why are you so sad?" The Guardian asked
"I had the best life and lost it to a theif......crying noises " cried Cubol

The Guardian told Cubol that if he was brave enough to go into paintings to collect pieces of his painting
he would give Cubol his life his painting and would change the identity of the Theif to an normal man...........

=============================

this game also saves data!

You can Press Escaper or Esc on your keyboard to pause the game incase of glitches or bugs (or really dumb level degsin)

btw im 12 .....

pls help....

k bye
